text: Offerton is a hamlet and former civil parish in Tyne and Wear, England. Situated about 4 miles west-southwest of Sunderland city centre. In 1961 the parish had a population of 133. == References == Category:Hamlets in Tyne and Wear Category:Former civil parishes in Tyne and Wear Category:City of Sunderland
title: Offerton, Tyne and Wear
